response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. Our product, which I believe holds immense value for you, is now available for acquisition. Given its significance and the unique benefits it offers, I propose a purchase price of $900,000. This offer represents a strategic advantage for both parties, allowing you to secure this valuable asset at a favorable rate. Should you require any further information or wish to discuss the details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 900000}
